span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n 讽刺： a harsh satire usually directed against an individual
【例】 a lampoon of the movie business at the time 对当时电影产业的一种讽刺
【近】 burlesque, caricature, farce, mockery, parody, ridicule, spoof, travesty
【反】 eulogy, ode, paean 颂歌

【记】 lamp 灯 + on →把灯照到别人上头，曝光
